Onye Ukwu ya Lily Albino Akol Akol bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Sudan nke nwere ọkwa iwu nke onye osote minista nke ozi na nkwukọrịta. Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka onye otu South Sudan National Dialogue Steering Committee

Ọ bụ onye nduzi nkwurịta okwu maka netwọk South Sudan Women empowerment, ọ bụkwa osote prọfesọ na Mahadum Juba ma na-eje ozi dị ka onye nduzi nke International Cooperation, Communication and Alumni Affairs, yana onye nkuzi na College of Arts and Humanities / Department of Mass Communication.
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ ugbo, ọhịa na njem nleta na Gọọmentị South Sudan, 2013-2016.
Lily nwere MA na nkwurịta okwu ụlọ ọrụ na nke nzukọ na Mahadum Farleigh Dickenson, New Jersey na BA na French na Bekee Language site na Mahadụ nke Khartoum
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi na South Sudan Anti-Corruption Commission; ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka nkuzi na ịkwado maka obodo ndị Sudan gbara ọsọ ndụ na Cairo, Egypt.
